entry.title: UV-C Sterilizing Machine E-209 Germicidal Cabinet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ikonna
Type: Sterilizer
Price: 118.00

Germicidal Cabinet UV-C Sterilizing Machine

  • Provides a germ-free environment for storage of implements and tools. Germicidal lamp is a Low-Pressure Mercury-Arc lamps that emits radiation peaking at 253.7nm (UV-C)
  • Inside tray is easily removable
  • Compatible Bulb: Philips and Ushio ("ushio G10T8 bulb")
  • Inner Dimensions: 8.75" x 6.5" x 13"
  • Outer Dimensions: 16" x 11" x 10" 

 Directions:

  1. Disinfect tools in a liquid solution
  2. Dry the tools
  3. Insert and seal tools in a sterilization pouch and seal
  4. Allow 30-40 minutes of exposure to sterilize your disinfected tools
NOTE TO BEAUTY PROS:
Laws vary by state regarding use of sterilization pouches

entry.title: Strike Bac Lemon Disinfectant 1 Gallon - EPA approved again Covid-19
entry.summary:
Vendor: Strike Bac
Type: Disinfectant
Price: 21.95

Strike Bac Disinfectant Cleaner with Lemon Scent

EPA approved for use against COVID-19. 
EPA registration number:1839-168-37265

Strike Bac Lemon Odor Disinfectant is a phosphate-free, formulation designed to provide effective cleaning, deodorizing, and disinfection for hospitals, nursing homes, schools, food service establishments, transportation terminals, office buildings, manufacturing facilities, lodging establishments, retail business, and athletic/recreation facilities where housekeeping is of prime importance in controlling cross-contamination from treated surfaces.

Strike Bac Lemon Odor Disinfectant is specially formulated for excellent cleaning while giving a pleasant lemon fragrance.  Dilutes economically so a little product goes a long way. It disinfects the following hard non-porous inanimate environmental surfaces: floors, walls, metal surfaces, stainless steel surfaces, glazed porcelain, glazed ceramic tile, plastic surfaces, vanity tops, shower stalls, bathtubs, and cabinets.

Please refer to the list below published by EPA
Look for EPA registration number:1839-168-37265

https://www.epa.gov/pesticide-registration/list-n-disinfectants-use-against-sars-cov-2

 

Instructions

  1. To Clean and Disinfect: Dilute 4 ounces in one gallon of water.
  2. Contact time: 10 minutes.

entry.title: Elite Hot Towel Cabinet - Mini
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nail Supply
Type: Towel Warmer
Price: 92.80

Elite Hot Towel Cabinet - Mini

Description

This mini single hot-towel-cabinet keeps towels warm all day long and can hold a maximum of 12 small, facial-sized towels. Maintains consistent temp of 150-160 degrees. Comes with water-drip pan and interior towel rack. For best results, use this hot-towel cabinet with small, facial-sized towels. Pre-soak the towels, wring them out, then roll them up and place towels on the wire rack inside the unit. When you turn the unit on, the towels will heat up. It is, along with our two other sizes (single & double), among our most popular and top selling hot-towel cabinets. Excellent quality, very reliable and reasonably priced interior dimensions: 10.5"w x 7 1/4" d x 5 3/8" h/ exterior dimensions: 13 3/4" w x 11" d x 10" h.

Features:

  • Holds 12 facial-sized (small, wash cloth) towels
  • Contains an internal temperature control so the unit does not over-heat
  • Insulated cabinet with padded heating element surrounds all internal walls for consistent heating
  • This unit does not rely on bulbs to heat which burn out and do not provide consistent heating

Product Details:

  • Shipping Weight: 11.25 pounds
  • International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
  • Part Number: HC-MINI
  • Item Weight: 9 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 17.8 x 10.5 x 14 inches
  • Item model number: HC-MINI
  • Color: White
  • Material: plastic, metal
  • Item Package Quantity: 1
  • Batteries Included?: No
  • Batteries Required?: No
